text.text_translated: "Possibly Dangerous Asteroids" are a type of **asteroid**, which are rocks that fly through space. These asteroids can pass very close to Earth. They come within 7.5 million kilometres of our planet's path in space. NASA has created a map of 1,400 of these possibly dangerous asteroids, but people do not think that any of them will be a danger in the next 100 years. NASA can watch these objects. They use technology that is already available. They can also say what might happen if an asteroid hits. If an asteroid is going to hit, two ways to protect Earth could be sent out.
